SQL: SELECT * FROM Parameters P WHERE Key1 IS NULL and Key2 IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Parameters P WHERE Key1='Age' AND Key2= ?1
SELECT * FROM Parameters P WHERE Key1='Ruleset' AND Key2 = ?1
SELECT * FROM Parameters P WHERE Key1='Map' AND Key2 = ?1

SELECT DefeatType AS ParameterID, D.Name AS Name, D.Description AS Description, Visible, ReadOnly, 1 AS SupportsSinglePlayer, 1 AS SupportsLANMultiplayer, 1 AS SupportsInternetMultiplayer, 0 AS ChangeableAfterGameStart, 'bool' AS Domain, 0 AS Hash, 1 AS DefaultValue, 'Game' AS ConfigurationGroup, DefeatType AS ConfigurationKey, 'Victories' AS GroupId, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Defeats D, Ages WHERE AgeType = ?1 and D.Domain = Ages.DefeatDomain

SELECT VictoryType AS ParameterID, V.Name AS Name, V.Description AS Description, Visible, ReadOnly, 1 AS SupportsSinglePlayer, 1 AS SupportsLANMultiplayer, 1 AS SupportsInternetMultiplayer, 0 AS ChangeableAfterGameStart, 'bool' AS Domain, 0 AS Hash, 1 AS DefaultValue, 'Game' AS ConfigurationGroup, VictoryType AS ConfigurationKey, 'Victories' AS GroupId, 20 AS SortIndex FROM Victories V, Ages WHERE AgeType =?1 and V.Domain = Ages.VictoryDomain
SELECT * FROM ParameterCriteria ORDER BY ParameterID
SELECT 'MaxTurns' AS ParameterID, 'Game' AS ConfigurationGroup, 'AGE' AS ConfigurationKey, 'NotEquals' AS Operator, AgeType AS ConfigurationValue FROM Ages WHERE FixedMaxTurns = 1
SELECT * FROM ParameterDependencies ORDER BY ParameterID
SELECT 'Resources' AS ParameterID, 'Map' AS ConfigurationGroup, 'MAP_SCRIPT' AS ConfigurationKey, 'NotEquals' AS Operator, File AS ConfigurationValue FROM Maps WHERE StaticMap = 1
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, AgeType AS Value, Banner, SortIndex FROM Ages
SELECT * FROM DomainValues WHERE Key1 IS NULL AND Key2 IS NULL
SELECT Domain, CivilizationType AS Value, CivilizationName as Name, CivilizationDescription AS Description, CivilizationIcon as Icon, SortIndex FROM Civilizations
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, DifficultyType AS Value, SortIndex FROM Difficulties
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, GameSpeedType AS Value, SortIndex FROM GameSpeeds
SELECT Domain, LeaderType AS Value, LeaderName as Name, LeaderDescription AS Description, LeaderIcon as Icon, SortIndex FROM Leaders
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, File AS Value, SortIndex FROM Maps WHERE (not WorldBuilderOnly or ?)
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, MapSizeType AS Value, MinPlayers, MaxPlayers, MaxHumans, DefaultPlayers, SortIndex FROM MapSizes

SELECT Mementos.Domain, Mementos.Name, Mementos.Description, Mementos.FunctionalDescription, Mementos.Type AS Value, Mementos.SortIndex, Rewards.CustomData AS Icon FROM Mementos INNER JOIN Rewards ON Mementos.Type = Rewards.GameItemID
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, LegacyPathClassName, AgeType, Category, LegacyPathClassType, LegacyPathClassName, LegacyPathType AS Value, SortIndex FROM LegacyPaths
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, Category, AgeCrisisEventType AS Value, AgeType, SortIndex FROM Crises
SELECT 'Rulesets' AS Domain, Name, Description, RulesetType AS Value, SortIndex FROM Rulesets
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, TurnTimerType AS Value, SortIndex FROM TurnTimers
SELECT Domain, Name, Description, TurnPhaseType AS Value, SortIndex FROM TurnPhases
SELECT * FROM DomainValueFilters WHERE Key1 IS NULL AND Key2 IS NULL
SELECT * FROM DomainValueUnions WHERE Key1 IS NULL AND Key2 IS NULL
SELECT * FROM DomainRanges
SELECT 'Players:*' AS Domain, LeaderType as Value, 'Intersect' as Filter FROM MapLeaders WHERE Map = ?1
SELECT ParameterID, Domain FROM DomainOverridesByMap WHERE Map = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Intersect' AS Filter FROM SupportedValuesByMap WHERE Map = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Difference' AS Filter FROM UnSupportedValuesByMap WHERE Map = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT ParameterID, Domain FROM DomainOverridesByRuleset WHERE RulesetType = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Intersect' AS Filter FROM SupportedValuesByRuleset WHERE RulesetType = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Difference' AS Filter FROM UnSupportedValuesByRuleset WHERE RulesetType = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT ParameterID, Domain FROM DomainOverridesByAge WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT 'PlayerCivilization' as ParameterID, PlayerCivilizationDomain as Domain FROM Ages WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 LIMIT 1
SELECT 'MapSize' as ParameterID, MapSizeDomain as Domain FROM Ages WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 LIMIT 1
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Intersect' AS Filter FROM SupportedValuesByAge WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT Domain, Value, 'Difference' AS Filter FROM UnSupportedValuesByAge WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 and (PlayerId = ?2 or PlayerId is null)
SELECT 'StandardTurnLimits' as Domain, 'TURNLIMIT_CUSTOM' as Value, 'Intersect' AS Filter FROM Ages WHERE Make_Hash(AgeType) = ?1 AND FixedMaxTurns = 1
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationUpdates WHERE Key1 IS NULL AND Key2 IS NULL
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationUpdates WHERE Key1='Age' AND Key2 = ?1
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationUpdates WHERE Key1='Ruleset' AND Key2 = ?1

SELECT 'Game' AS SourceGroup, 'StartAge' AS SourceKey, AgeType AS SourceValue, 'Game' AS TargetGroup, 'TurnLimitType' AS TargetKey, 'TURNLIMIT_NONE' AS TargetValue, 1 AS 'Hash' FROM Ages WHERE MaxTurns = 0

SELECT 'Game' AS SourceGroup, 'StartAge' AS SourceKey, AgeType AS SourceValue, 'Game' AS TargetGroup, 'TurnLimitType' AS TargetKey, 'TURNLIMIT_CUSTOM' AS TargetValue, 1 AS 'Hash' FROM Ages WHERE MaxTurns > 0
SELECT 'Game' AS SourceGroup, 'AGE' AS SourceKey, AgeType AS SourceValue, 'Game' AS TargetGroup, 'MaxTurns' AS TargetKey, MaxTurns AS TargetValue FROM Ages WHERE MaxTurns IS NOT NULL

SELECT 'Game' As SourceGroup, 'AGE' AS SourceKey, AgeType AS SourceValue, 'Game' AS TargetGroup, VictoryType AS TargetKey, 1 AS TargetValue FROM Victories V, Ages WHERE V.EnabledByDefault = 1 AND V.Domain = Ages.VictoryDomain
